columns.Claim_Stage_ID: The stage of the claim in the processing workflow.
columns.Claim_ID: The unique identifier for each claim being processed.
columns.Claim_Outcome_Code: The current status of the claim's processing outcome.
columns.Staff_ID: The identifier for the staff member handling the claim.
columns.Claim_Processing_ID: The unique identifier for each claims processing entry.

Claims_Processing.table_description: The table processes and tracks the status of insurance claims.

columns.Customer_ID: The unique identifier for each customer in the database.
columns.Customer_Details: The information pertaining to each customer, such as name.

Customers.table_description: The table tracks customer information for insurance claims processing.

columns.Claim_ID: The unique identifier for each insurance claim document.
columns.Document_Type_Code: The type of document related to the claim process.
columns.Created_by_Staff_ID: The identifier for the staff member who created the document.
columns.Created_Date: The date when the document was created in the system.

Claims_Documents.table_description: The table stores documents associated with insurance claims and their details.

columns.Claim_Stage_ID: The unique identifier for each claim processing stage.
columns.Next_Claim_Stage_ID: The identifier for the subsequent stage in the process.
columns.Claim_Status_Name: The name of the current status of the claim.
columns.Claim_Status_Description: The detailed description of the claim's status.

Claims_Processing_Stages.table_description: The table outlines stages and statuses in the claims processing workflow.

columns.Staff_ID: The unique identifier for each staff member in the database.
columns.Staff_Details: The personal details of each staff member, such as name.

Staff.table_description: The table maintains information about staff involved in claims processing.

columns.Policy_ID: The unique identifier for each insurance policy in the database.
columns.Customer_ID: The unique identifier for the customer associated with the policy.
columns.Policy_Type_Code: The designated type of insurance policy provided.
columns.Start_Date: The date when the insurance policy becomes effective.
columns.End_Date: The date when the insurance policy expires.

Policies.table_description: The table records and manages insurance policy details for customers.

columns.Claim_Header_ID: The unique identifier for each claim header entry.
columns.Claim_Status_Code: The current status of the insurance claim.
columns.Claim_Type_Code: The designated type of the insurance claim filed.
columns.Policy_ID: The identifier for the policy related to the claim.
columns.Date_of_Claim: The date when the claim was officially filed.
columns.Date_of_Settlement: The date when the claim was settled or resolved.
columns.Amount_Claimed: The total amount requested in the insurance claim.
columns.Amount_Piad: The amount that has been paid for the claim settlement.

Claim_Headers.table_description: The table captures details and statuses of insurance claims.
